tool_description: This API allows generating random colored palettes with the number of palettes and color per palette and harmony mode (Monochromatic, Complementary, Triad etc...)
name: Random Palette Generator
title: Random Palette Generator

api_list.name: Get Palettes using Random Mode
api_list.description: Get Palettes Using random Scheme, defined Number of Palettes and defined Number of Colors Per Palettes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com/palette/10/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com/palette/{paletteno}/{colorno}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Full
api_list.description: Get Palettes Using Scheme, Number of Palettes and Number of Colors Per Palettes

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com/palette/{type}/{paletteno}/{colorno}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-palette-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
